summary: AIRBAG WARNING LIGHT CAME ON TOOK IT TODEALER AFTER 3 HRS OF DIGNOSTICS THEY COULD NOT FIND WHAT WAS WRONG, I CALLED HONDA USA THEY ASSIGNED A INDIVIDUAL TO HELP,, NE NEVER DID ANYTHING AND WOULD CALL WHEN HE KNEW I WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO ANSWER IM CONCERNED AS I DONT KNOW IF THE AIRBAG IS FAULTY OR THE WARNING LIGHT ABSOLUTELY NO ASSISTANCE FROM HONDA
